title: card.usage.test Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing data usage projection and analysis results.

max.description: The days of projected data available based on test.

days.description: The number of days used for the test.

bytes_per_day.description: Average bytes per day used during the test period.

seconds.description: Number of seconds in the analyzed period.

bytes_sent.description: Number of bytes sent by the Notecard to Notehub.

bytes_received.description: Number of bytes received by the Notecard from Notehub.

notes_sent.description: Number of notes sent by the Notecard to Notehub.

notes_received.description: Number of notes received by the Notecard from Notehub.
